summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3250, for the improvement of Beacon Avenue, from Spokane Street to Hinds Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40266 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
